description: Describes the connection status of the specified WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: WorkspaceIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the WorkSpaces. You can specify up to 25 WorkSpaces. (string) ---

nested_items.name: WorkspacesConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: Information about the connection status of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: ConnectionState
nested_items.description: The connection state of the WorkSpace. The connection state is unknown if the WorkSpace is stopped.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStateCheckTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the connection status check.

nested_items.name: LastKnownUserConnectionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last known user connection.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
